full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): NO TITLE [@001A *, ,RIG PA NGO SPRAD GCIR MTHONG RANG GROL DANG, ,NA RAG DONG SPRUGS 'GYOD TSANGS KYI RGYAL PO YANG SO SBYONG BA'I YANG SNYING BZHUGS, ,]
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @033B (CES RANG GZHAN THAMS CAD KYIS GSUM DU BYA'O, ,DE NAS BAR DO THOS GROL DANG, 'PHRAD GROL DANG, 'JIGS SKYOB PA'I SMON LAM BTAB PAR BYA'O, ,SANGS RGYAS DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' RA MDAR SPRAN PA'I SMON LAM, AU RGYAN GYI MKHAN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS MDZAD PA KUN LA SPEL BAR BYA'O, ,DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
